alert.note: Alert for Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 3:21PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Henry, southwestern Clay and northwestern Early Counties through 445 PM EDT/345 PM CDT/... At 421 PM EDT/321 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Abbeville, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Fort Gaines, Haleburg, Shorterville, Walter F. George Lock And Dam, Barnes, Hardwickburg, Zetto, Hayes, Murphy Station, Graball, Miller, Abbeville Municipal A/P, Willis Crossroads and Fort Gaines-Clay Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
